name: Lokalete
tag_list: custom-logo-t-shirts, e-commerce-solutions, inventory-management, fulfillment, premium-logo-t-shirts, merchandise-solutions
overview:
Lokalete - Wear its At!

www.lokalete.com is a custom eCommerce solution that provides, printing, eCommerce, branding and marketing solutions primarily to the hospitality sector.

  • eCommerce/Shopping cart system -POS integration/Inventory management
  • Merchandise fulfillment
  • Custom Shopping cart systems
  • Custom T shirts
  • Custom Merchandise solutions
  • Branding/Marketing Solutions

  • Be showcased on our (patent pending) location based map shopping technology

    List your brand next to the worlds largest brands and get recognized today
